typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		exportName as string,
		sqlStatement as string,
		excelFile as string,
		excelPassword as string,
		excelWorkSheetName as string,
		targetPath as string,
		excelTableStyle as string,
		isActive as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GetExpViewMeta
GetExpViewMeta derive(isActive = toBinary(isActive)) ~> TypedColumns
TypedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as long,
		exportName as string,
		sqlStatement as string,
		excelFile as string,
		excelPassword as string,
		excelWorkSheetName as string,
		targetPath as string,
		excelTableStyle as string,
		isActive as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		exportName,
		sqlStatement,
		excelFile,
		excelPassword,
		excelWorkSheetName,
		targetPath,
		excelTableStyle,
		isActive
	)) ~> InsertMetaTable
